Package com.example.freeturilo.storage

Class StorageConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.freeturilo.storage.StorageConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InternalConnection
    public class StorageConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements InternalConnection
    An internal storage connection.

    Object of this class performs low-level operations on device's internal storage files.

    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Miko≈Çaj Terzyk
    See Also:
    context, InternalConnection, StorageConnection.Builder, Context

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  StorageConnection.Builder
      Builder of internal storage connections.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private android.content.Context context
      Stores the context of the application used to perform data transaction with internal storage.
      private java.lang.String filename
      Stores the filename of the file which is the source or the target of data transaction performed within this connection.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      private StorageConnection​(java.lang.String filename, android.content.Context context)
      Class constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean checkFileAbsent()
      Checks if the internal storage file of this connection is absent in internal storage.
      java.io.InputStream openFileInput()
      Gets the input stream of this connection which can be later used to read content of the internal storage file of this connection.
      java.io.OutputStream openFileOutput()
      Gets the output stream of this connection which can be later used to write to the internal storage file of this connection.

      • openFileOutput

        public java.io.OutputStream openFileOutput()
                                    throws StorageException
        Gets the output stream of this connection which can be later used to write to the internal storage file of this connection.
        Specified by:
        openFileOutput in interface InternalConnection
        Returns:
        a writeable output stream
        Throws:
        StorageException - an exception representing an error which occurred when trying to retrieve the output stream

      • openFileInput

        public java.io.InputStream openFileInput()
                                  throws StorageException
        Gets the input stream of this connection which can be later used to read content of the internal storage file of this connection.
        Specified by:
        openFileInput in interface InternalConnection
        Returns:
        a readable input stream
        Throws:
